channel.title: CVE Feed for baserproject -- basercms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for baserproject -- basercms

item.title: CVE-2024-46994|2024-10-24T19:23:55.028Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Versions prior to 5.1.2 have a cross-site scripting vulnerability in Blog posts and Contents list Feature. Version 5.1.2 fixes this issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-46995|2024-10-24T19:23:24.838Z -- baserproject -- basercms
item.description: baserCMS is a website development framework. Versions prior to 5.1.2 have a cross-site scripting vulnerability in HTTP 400 Bad Request. Version 5.1.2 fixes this issue.
